title: Workshop on Participation Motivation Design Through Citizen Science Games (CSG)

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Application of language domain (leveraging strengths in in-game text/feedback design)

learning_goals: Five factors contributing to decreased participation motivation in CSG can be analyzed, and improvement strategies can be proposed
Science communication strategies optimized for mobile environments can be designed

Learners apply game-based learning experience design principles to complete evaluation project deliverables (scenario cards, assessment rubrics, sample feedback) for three customer interaction scenarios (e.g., complaint handling, reservation changes, VIP service) within one week

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
